en: As the months and weeks have dwindled by, you've started to really feel the task that's on your shoulders. You don't have many people to talk to about it - Takashi bailed so he wouldn't be a distraction, Skylar means well but doesn't quite understand, and no one at work can now about what you're doing lest they blab it to Roger.

The days stretch on long before you, and you wish you had more people to reach out to. But inside your little "office space," you're alone. And this is what you asked for, isn't it? This is just a price you have to pay.
